name: The Traded Groom
storyline:
Today's your wedding day, and you've never met your husband.

You're the chief of several semi-nomadic clans; he's an imperial prince of the Han people, with whom you have a complicated political relationship. You meet for the first time on the same day you marry, and you quickly find that he isn't the arrogant, prideful prince you'd expected.

Get to know him over the night and find out whether he's a spy for your enemies or a victim of political schemes; and most of all, whether this marriage can work.
summary: a short 18+ otome about getting to know your new husband
